title: PROD LIKE ENVIRONMENT - SECLI - SANITY CHECKS

task_list.instruction_title: Check SECLI PROD FTP CONFIGURATION, USER & PASSWORD, … BEFORE STARTING THE CSD MIG

_  **Drop all the content of root folder /backup, if not empty, **before the migration starts. Note that if this folder has been brought from PROD without being truncated, it would contain all the hourly backups performed in PROD, ammountiung to several Gb of useless data, which might compromise our backup plan.

**RUN/DR ONLY - PROOF OF DATA CURRENCY**:
Implement the control you have defined beforehand to check and proove that the database restored in PROD LIKE is the exact copy of teh snapshot used for refresh, as of

You may elect the technique of your choice:
_- You may have inserted a subtle **marker **in your data (via UI or DB) before the PROD snapshot, typically in a free text field for y record of the snapshot day for instance.
- You may be able to run an SQL type (SELECT *) statement in your database to prove that you don'te have any records older than the cutober date
- If you can thing of any other method, please advise here
